title: PLAY BUTTON ON NEW CLIENT DOESNT WORK!!!
body: So i updated the client with hard arduous work since apparently League of Legends is NOT registering my internet. I can open the client, log in, but when im in, the news don't show and i CANT press the Play button. The only way i con this s by connecting to my cellular hot spot. Im a Liberty user and not even the pages of League of Legends load. I have this problem on MAC and Windows. PLEASE HELP ! I know its an internet problem but i can use google, Facebook and all other webpages fine ! It just doesn't work with league.

replies.body:
This certainly sounds like an issue with your connection, since you've confirmed that this can be resolved by using your 4G hotspot. Note that each server, website or game you access resides in a different geolocation, so you could have issues with League while not having an issue with other sites/services. I recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that may resolve this for you.

Let me know if those steps helped.
